feed.title: Zipline Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Zipline: v3.7.7
entry.content:
What's changed

  • Prisma version mismatch hotfix (prisma@5.1.x now), sorry about the issues yesterday!
  • Better styling in view file card and upload file dropzone
  • Password protected non-media files can be viewed now
  • /r route supports ?password={password} query now!

Pulls merged

  • Enhance view file and file upload view by @TheZoker in https://github.com/diced/zipline/pull/494

New Contributors

  • @TheZoker made their first contribution in https://github.com/diced/zipline/pull/494

Full Changelog: https://github.com/diced/zipline/compare/v3.7.6...v3.7.7

entry.title: New release for Zipline: v3.7.8
entry.content:
What's changed

  • new year new zipline update
  • better alignment for thumbnails
  • folder viewing fixed
  • thumbnails show up in folder views
  • max width and height on videos/images on view route
  • new locale and tz options for date variables: {file.createdAt::locale::en-US,America/Los_Angeles}

Pulls Merged

  • Fixed Discord Mobile Video Embeded Res Bug by @L7NEG in https://github.com/diced/zipline/pull/509
  • fix(shorten): typo by @wdhdev in https://github.com/diced/zipline/pull/513
  • Add autohotkey file extension (.ahk) to mimes.json by @SeaswimmerTheFsh in https://github.com/diced/zipline/pull/511
  • fix: Merge create endpoint into register and prevent non admins from … by @TacticalTechJay in https://github.com/diced/zipline/pull/517
  • Improve error handling for file expiry by @Wingysam in https://github.com/diced/zipline/pull/519
  • fix: prisma deletion errors by @Vetlix in https://github.com/diced/zipline/pull/522

New Contributors

  • @L7NEG made their first contribution in https://github.com/diced/zipline/pull/509
  • @wdhdev made their first contribution in https://github.com/diced/zipline/pull/513
  • @SeaswimmerTheFsh made their first contribution in https://github.com/diced/zipline/pull/511
  • @Wingysam made their first contribution in https://github.com/diced/zipline/pull/519

Full Changelog: https://github.com/diced/zipline/compare/v3.7.7...v3.7.8

entry.title: New release for Zipline: v3.7.9
entry.content:
What's changed

  • ampm modifier for dates
  • x-zipline-folder header (the value should be a folder id)
  • this automatically adds the file you are uploading to the folder

Bugs fixed

  • fixed {file.size::bytes} not working on some conditions #532
  • fixed image resizing in view route #527

Full Changelog: https://github.com/diced/zipline/compare/v3.7.8...v3.7.9

entry.title: New release for Zipline: v3.7.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fixed path traversal (update if you are v3.4 and above)
  • this is only exploitable if the user is logged in
  • Add Catppuccin themes by @cswimr in https://github.com/diced/zipline/pull/560
  • fix: audio & video scrubbing by @ari-party in https://github.com/diced/zipline/pull/576
  • fix: hyprland is no longer wlroots-based by @polymo1 in https://github.com/diced/zipline/pull/581
  • file ordering for viewing other user files
  • thumbnails for videos show up on folder file viewing
  • fixed ratelimit bypass on uploading
  • views are incremented on view/code routes
  • files are deleted when they reach maxViews on view routes

(sorry for double release - forgot to change the version)

New Contributors

  • @MateiSR made their first contribution in https://github.com/diced/zipline/pull/575
  • @ari-party made their first contribution in https://github.com/diced/zipline/pull/576
  • @polymo1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/diced/zipline/pull/581

Full Changelog: https://github.com/diced/zipline/compare/v3.7.9...v3.7.10

entry.title: New release for Zipline: v3.7.11
entry.content:
⚠️ Important ⚠️

  • Vulnerability within oauth
  • Versions affected: anything past v3.6.0
  • Providers affected: Google
  • The vulnerability is caused due to a backwards compatibility fallback method of trying to find a oauth user, this fallback method would not rely on the provider's ID but instead just the username + provider name. This meant that as long as the determined username was the same, two google accounts with the same username will point to the same user if linked.
  • This doesn't effect discord or github, since they have unique usernames.
  • If you don't use oauth, you are totally fine to continue using previous versions at your own risk.

What's Changed

  • feat(ci): push to docker hub by @wdhdev in https://github.com/diced/zipline/pull/613
  • fix: code scroll overflow handling by @quantum5 in https://github.com/diced/zipline/pull/620
  • Update README.md by @Rovoska in https://github.com/diced/zipline/pull/627
  • fix(repo): update devcontainer defaults to use bundled postgres by @Hegi in https://github.com/diced/zipline/pull/585
  • feat: proper range request handling by @ari-party in https://github.com/diced/zipline/pull/635
  • fix: Check if route was set to /r, as it's reserved. by @TacticalTechJay in https://github.com/diced/zipline/pull/643

New Contributors

  • @quantum5 made their first contribution in https://github.com/diced/zipline/pull/620
  • @Rovoska made their first contribution in https://github.com/diced/zipline/pull/627
  • @Hegi made their first contribution in https://github.com/diced/zipline/pull/585

Full Changelog: https://github.com/diced/zipline/compare/v3.7.10...v3.7.11
